word: When Christ gave to His disciples the conditions of salvation, He said, \93If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.\94 Self-denial and crosses lie directly in the path of every soul who will follow Jesus. Our advance heavenward will be opposed at every step; for Satan will come in many ways to mislead, to deceive, and to clothe sin with the appearance of good. . . .
